Text: Thanks again SecTPB. This is different! having the fighter pick the coach, rather than the other way around, & 4 coaches to choose from, I hope you plan on keeping us updated on this series, looks really good. Cheers.
Sec, you're the king of mma
many thanks! not sure if this is gonna be any good or not but as an mma fan you have to check it out. good work sec!
